body_html: Nothing is impossible, it would just take a lot of work to plumb that through everywhere, to set the option globally, and for everything to work as well without broadcasting. For example, when computing gradients, automatic broadcasting is quite useful to simplify gradient expressions, particularly when the shapes are unknown at construction time. I've seen similar requests made for numpy, and it sounds like higher level libraries typically provide the 'safety' for those users who want it. However, I'm open to the idea if it can be done in a nice way.
